message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $14,000 is a fair offer, the value of this product to me is quite high.  Could you meet me at $18,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $15,000. Can we meet at that price?
